# Empty States ## Initial Empty States Once content is added, this will never show. Wordsmith the empty text to tell the user that there is nothing to display, and instruct them how to add content.
## Reccuring Empty States (cycle) Content is continually created and resolved. This empty state will show when tasks are complete. Wordsmith the empty text to tell the user that there is nothing to display, and instruct them how to add content.
## Missing Permissions The user shouldn't be able to navigate to the page through the menu. If they can, show this message on the page.
### With link
## Payroll Closed
## Add State **Kanban** The add state should always be in the first position, even once content is available.
**Add Tile**
